title: Blended Learning-Based Nursing Mathematics Proficiency Improvement Program for Nursing Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Provides a blended educational environment combining VR simulations and online modules for in-service nurses.

learning_goals: Learners can perform medication dosage calculation simulations with 90% accuracy in VR environments
Learners can improve mathematical self-efficacy by over 30% through blended learning activities
Learners can explain safe medication administration procedures in complex clinical scenarios in three or more steps
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
